metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31323 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Telegram Android <7.1.0 (2090), Telegram iOS <7.1, and Telegram macOS <7.1 are affected by a Heap Buffer Overflow in the LottieParserImpl::parseDashProperty function of their custom fork of the rlottie library. A remote attacker might be able to access heap memory out-of-bounds on a victim device via a malicious animated sticker.

criterions.comment: rlottie package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
